text.section:
This section does not apply to a person who:
was acting in the capacity of a licensee, or an employee of a licensee, under Article 2B of the Code; and
has committed a violation of and is subject to the penalties under Article 2B, § 12-108 of the Code.

An adult who violates § 10-116 or § 10-117 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to:
a fine not exceeding $2,500 for a first offense; or
a fine not exceeding $5,000 for a second or subsequent offense.
